verses.verse: For we know <WG1492> that if <WG1437> our earthly <WG1919> house <WG3614> of this <WG3588> tabernacle <WG4636> were dissolved, <WG2647> we have <WG2192> a building <WG3619> of God, <WG2316> an house <WG3614> not made <WG886> with hands, <WG886> eternal <WG166> in the heavens. <WG3772>
For in this <WG5129> we groan, <WG4727> earnestly <WG1971> desiring <WG1971> to be clothed <WG1902> on with our house <WG3613> which <WG3588> is from heaven: <WG3772>
If <WG1489> so be that being clothed <WG1746> we shall not be found <WG2147> naked. <WG1131>

For we that are in this <WG3588> tabernacle <WG4636> do groan, <WG4727> being burdened: <WG916> not for that we would <WG2309> be unclothed, <WG1562> but clothed <WG1902> on, that mortality <WG2349> might be swallowed <WG2666> up of life. <WG2222>
Now <WG1161> he that has worked <WG2716> us for the selfsame <WG846> <WG5124> thing is God, <WG2316> who <WG3588> also <WG2532> has given <WG1325> to us the earnest <WG728> of the Spirit. <WG4151>
Therefore <WG3767> we are always <WG3842> confident, <WG2292> knowing <WG1492> that, whilst we are at <WG1722> home <WG1736> in the body, <WG4983> we are absent <WG1553> from the Lord: <WG2962>
(For we walk <WG4043> by faith, <WG4102> not by sight: <WG1491>)
We are confident, <WG2292> I say, and willing <WG2106> rather <WG3123> to be absent <WG1553> from the body, <WG4983> and to be present <WG1736> with the Lord. <WG2962>
Why <WG1352> we labor, <WG5389> that, whether <WG1535> present <WG1736> or <WG1535> absent, <WG1553> we may be accepted <WG2101> of him.

For we must <WG1163> all <WG3956> appear <WG5319> before <WG1715> the judgment <WG968> seat <WG968> of Christ; <WG5547> that every <WG1538> one may receive <WG2865> the things done in his body, <WG4983> according <WG4314> to that he has done, <WG4238> whether <WG1535> it be good <WG18> or <WG1535> bad. <WG2556>

Knowing <WG1492> therefore <WG3767> the terror <WG5401> of the Lord, <WG2962> we persuade <WG3982> men; <WG444> but we are made <WG5319> manifest <WG5319> to God; <WG2316> and I trust <WG1679> also <WG2532> are made <WG5319> manifest <WG5319> in your <WG5216> consciences. <WG4893>

For we commend <WG4921> not ourselves <WG1438> again <WG3825> to you, but give <WG1325> you occasion <WG874> to glory <WG2745> on <WG5228> our behalf, <WG5228> that you may have <WG2192> somewhat to answer them which glory <WG2744> in appearance, <WG4383> and not in heart. <WG2588>
For whether <WG1535> we be beside <WG1839> ourselves, it is to God: <WG2316> or <WG1535> whether <WG1535> we be sober, <WG4993> it is for your <WG5213> cause.

For the love <WG26> of Christ <WG5547> constrains <WG4912> us; because we thus <WG5124> judge, <WG2919> that if <WG1487> one <WG1520> died <WG599> for all, <WG3956> then <WG686> were all <WG3956> dead: <WG599>

And that he died <WG599> for all, <WG3956> that they which live <WG2198> should not from now on <WG3371> live <WG2198> to themselves, <WG1438> but to him which died <WG599> for them, and rose <WG1453> again. <WG1453>

Why <WG5620> from now on <WG575> know <WG1492> we no <WG3762> man <WG3762> after <WG2596> the flesh: <WG4561> yes, <WG1161> though <WG1499> we have known <WG1097> Christ <WG5547> after <WG2596> the flesh, <WG4561> yet <WG235> now <WG3568> from now on <WG2089> know <WG1097> we him no <WG3765> more. <WG2089>

Therefore <WG5620> if <WG1487> any <WG1536> man be in Christ, <WG5547> he is a new <WG2537> creature: <WG2937> old <WG744> things are passed <WG3928> away; behold, <WG2400> all <WG3956> things are become <WG1096> new. <WG2537>

And all <WG3956> things are of God, <WG2316> who <WG3588> has reconciled <WG2644> us to himself <WG1438> by Jesus <WG2424> Christ, <WG5547> and has given <WG1325> to us the ministry <WG1248> of reconciliation; <WG2643>

To wit, <WG5613> that God <WG2316> was in Christ, <WG5547> reconciling <WG2644> the world <WG2889> to himself, <WG1438> not imputing <WG3049> their trespasses <WG3900> to them; and has committed <WG5087> to us the word <WG3056> of reconciliation. <WG2643>

Now <WG3767> then we are ambassadors <WG4243> for Christ, <WG5547> as though God <WG2316> did beseech <WG3870> you by us: we pray <WG1189> you in Christ's <WG5547> stead, <WG5228> be you reconciled <WG2644> to God. <WG2316>
For he has made <WG4160> him to be sin <WG266> for us, who knew <WG1097> no <WG3361> sin; <WG266> that we might be made <WG1096> the righteousness <WG1343> of God <WG2316> in him.
